entry.title: Microsoft Bets Big on the Creator of ChatGPT in Race to Dominate A.I.
entry.quote: As a new chatbot wows the world with its conversational talents, a resurgent tech giant is poised to reap the benefits while doubling down on a relationship with the start-up OpenAI.

entry.title: Vigilantes for views: The YouTube pranksters harassing suspected scam callers in India
entry.quote: Los Angeles-based Trilogy Media took “scambaiting” to a new level,but some claim they’re gaining viral fame at others’ expense.

entry.title: The FAA Outage Lays Bare an Essential System Everyone Hates
entry.quote: A glitch in the so-called NOTAM system caused the agency to ground flights across the US. But its problems go back years.

entry.title: The Heart Wing
entry.quote: While you fret about your bank account, your forehead wrinkles, or that person who hasn’t replied to your email, the heart — your heart — just keeps on keeping on in a way no other muscle could.

entry.title: How Much Netflix Can the World Absorb?
entry.quote: Bela Bajaria, who oversees the streaming giant’s hyper-aggressive approach to TV-making, says success is about “recognizing that people like having more.”
